Gertrude Ntiti Shope (amụrụ n'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1925) bụ onye South Africa bụbu onye otu ọrụ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
A mụrụ Shope na Johannesburg na 15 Ọgọst, na afọ 1925, a zụlitere ya ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Southern Rhodesia (nke bụzi Zimbabwe)

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi tupu ọ bụrụ onye otu African National Congress na afọ 1954. N'ịbanye na mkpọsa megide agụmakwụkwọ Bantu, ọ tụgharịrị gaa na nkuzi ọrụ aka kama. Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Federation of South African Women, ma ruo oge ụfọdụ duzie Central Western Jabavu Branch nke ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke ANC

Ọ biri na mba ọzọ site na afọ 1966 ruo 1990, na-eduga ndị nnọchi anya pati ahụ na Nzukọ Ụmụ nwanyị nke Nairobi ma na-arụ ọrụ maka World Federation of Trade Unions. Site na afo 1970 ruo afọ 1971 ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ Florence Moposho, na-enyere aka ịmepụta mbipụta nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Voice of Women

Ya na di ya, Mark, biri n'ebe dị iche iche n'oge ọ na-agba ọsọ, gụnyere Prague, Botswana, Tanzania, Czechoslovakia, Zambia, na Nigeria. Na Lusaka, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nnọchi anya African National Congress. Site na afo 1991 ruo afọ 1993 Shope bụ onye isi nke African National Congress Women's League
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 1994, a laghachiri ya na ndị omeiwu.
